import React, { Component } from 'react' import appPostDefaultImg from '../../assets/images/wormhole.jpg' import './profile.css' class UserPostImgs extends Component { render() { const {posts} = this.props return (
{posts.map((postImg, i) => (
i.target.src=`${appPostDefaultImg}`} className='gallery-image'/>

))}
) } } export default UserPostImgs
